alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 21 at 8:10PM PDT until May 21 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN SAN BERNARDINO COUNTY... At 810 PM PDT, CHP reported roadway flooding near Morongo Road and Ball road due to earlier heavy rainfall. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Twentynine Palms, Twentynine Palms Base, SR 62 east of TWentynine Palms. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
